text: Nicktoons (or sometimes Nicktoons Network) is a network that had its launch in the late 70s. It was the network to air the first three Nicktoons, (The Ren and Stimpy Show), (Doug) and (Rugrats). It's one of the most famous channels in the UK. Its most famous shows are Hey Arnold, Spongebob SquarePants and The Loud House. Category:British television channels
title: Nicktoons (British and Irish TV channel)
